title: Ticket #2190: startd asserts with dynamic slots on if it rejects a job offer
description:
If dynamic slots are enabled: 

SLOT_TYPE_1=cpus=4
NUM_SLOTS=1
NUM_SLOTS_TYPE_1 = 1
SLOT_TYPE_1_PARTITIONABLE=true

and a job is submitted which will match in the negotiator, but not in the startd, like so: 

requirements = DaemonStartTime > 100

Then the startd asserts so: 

05/25/11 13:28:41 slot1: Claiming protocol failed
05/25/11 13:28:41 slot1: Changing state: Owner -> Delete
05/25/11 13:28:41 ERROR "IdDispenser::insert: 1 is already free" at line 54 in file /scratch/gthain/CONDOR_SRC/src/condor_startd.V6/IdDispenser.cpp
remarks:
2011-Jun-29 08:40:10 by matt:
IIRC, this was not reproducible on 7.6 or 7.7.

2013-Feb-13 09:39:22 by gthain:
works correctly in 7.9
creator: gthain
